items.content_html:
Summary

Deno does not support dynamic imports in deno compile'd binaries. This PR adds
a note about this to the dynamic import compat data.

Related issues

Fixes #16767
items.title: Note about dynamic imports in `deno compile`

items.content_html:
Summary

This was falsely marked as supported in #18056.

Test results and supporting details

https://wpt.fyi/results/service-workers/cache-storage?label=master&label=stable&product=deno&view=subtest

Related issues

Fixes #18235
items.title: Deno does not support Cache.add/addAll/keys

items.content_html:
Summary

WebAssembly.Exception and WebAssembly.Tag are part of the Wasm exceptions
proposal. This was enabled in Deno 1.15 (V8 9.5).

Test results and supporting details

See
https://wpt.fyi/results/wasm/jsapi/exception?label=master&label=stable&product=deno-1.14.3&product=deno-1.15.0&view=subtest
and
https://wpt.fyi/results/wasm/jsapi/tag?label=master&label=stable&product=deno-1.14.3&product=deno-1.15.0&view=subtest.
items.title: Deno support for Wasm Exceptions

items.content_html:
Summary

Deno has supported the Intl Locale Info proposal since version 1.19.0 (V8 9.9).

Test results and supporting details

These were enabled in V8 9.9, and Deno 1.19.0 was the first version to use V8
9.9.
items.title: Deno support for Intl Locale Info proposal

items.content_html:
Summary

Deno has supported the Intl Enumeration proposal since version 1.19.0 (V8 9.9).

Test results and supporting details

These were enabled in V8 9.9, and Deno 1.19.0 was the first version to use V8
9.9.
items.title: Deno support for Intl Enumeration proposal

items.content_html:
Summary

This has been the case since Deno 1.0, because all versions of Deno
implement >=ES2018.

Test results and supporting details

V8 has implemented this since version 6.6, and Deno 1.0 uses V8 version 8.4.
items.title: Add Deno version for Function.toString revision

items.content_html:
Summary

The keepalive parameter to the Fetch (and Request) API is still not supported by Firefox and this is likely to catch people out.

This PR grabs the fetch param data from the Request API to make this clearer (located in api/Request.json).

Test results and supporting details

Symlinked build dir into mdn/content and checked build.

Related issues
items.title: Add fetch keepalive compat data

items.content_html:
Spec: https://w3c.github.io/resource-timing/#dom-performanceresourcetiming-responsestatus

Chromestatus: https://chromestatus.com/feature/5163838794629120 / https://groups.google.com/a/chromium.org/g/blink-dev/c/kZfaF3F2mbs/m/IGDpJca8AwAJ
Webkit: https://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?id=246857
Gecko: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1796785
items.title: Add PerformanceResourceTiming.responseStatus

items.content_html:
This PR updates and corrects version values for Chromium (Chrome, Opera, Samsung Internet, WebView Android) for the BrowserCaptureMediaStreamTrack API, based upon results from the mdn-bcd-collector project (v7.0.0).

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/api/BrowserCaptureMediaStreamTrack

Check out the collector's guide on how to review this PR.
items.title: Update Chromium versions for BrowserCaptureMediaStreamTrack API

items.content_html:

https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/api/BiquadFilterNode
https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/api/DynamicsCompressorNode
https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/api/MediaStreamAudioDestinationNode
https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/api/WaveShaperNode

Check out the collector's guide on how to review this PR.
items.title: Update Chromium versions for Audio APIs

items.content_html:
This PR is a part of a project to add missing interfaces and interface features to BCD that are from an active spec (including WICG specs) and is supported in at least one browser. This particular PR adds the missing slotchange_event member of the ShadowRoot API, populating the results using data from the mdn-bcd-collector project (v7.0.0).

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/api/ShadowRoot/slotchange_event

Check out the collector's guide on how to review this PR.
items.title: Add missing api.ShadowRoot.slotchange_event feature

items.content_html:
This PR is a part of a project to add missing interfaces and interface features to BCD that are from an active spec (including WICG specs) and is supported in at least one browser. This particular PR adds the missing [dis]connect_event member of the Serial API, populating the results using data from the mdn-bcd-collector project (v7.0.0).

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/api/Serial/[dis]connect_event

Check out the collector's guide on how to review this PR.
items.title: Add missing api.Serial.[dis]connect_event feature

items.content_html:
This PR is a part of a project to add missing interfaces and interface features to BCD that are from an active spec (including WICG specs) and is supported in at least one browser. This particular PR adds the missing activationStart member of the PerformanceNavigationTiming API, populating the results using data from the mdn-bcd-collector project (v7.0.0).

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/api/PerformanceNavigationTiming/activationStart

Check out the collector's guide on how to review this PR.
items.title: Add missing api.PerformanceNavigationTiming.activationStart feature

items.content_html:
…and it's descriptors

Summary

Updated the Browser Support for Firefox for the following:

  • font-palette CSS Property
  • @font-palette-values CSS at-rule
  • font-family CSS descriptor for @font-palette-values
  • base-palette CSS descriptor for @font-palette-values
  • override-colors CSS descriptor for @font-palette-values

Test results and supporting details

Tested in Firefox 107

Related issues

None
items.title: added the firefox support for font-palette &  @font-palette-values

items.content_html: Based on mdn-bcd-collector.
items.title: Add "preview" for things in STP 158

items.content_html:
Summary

This PR adds several options and constraints that were added to the Screen Capture API recently. The additions are explained in my research document: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1HUZMVu_hGTUdkThLhqrUDMBKqvFS5YNRs0xGEHIYaMY/edit#heading=h.oieqm2j8cv9l

Test results and supporting details

Chrome version support verified with the relevant Chromium engineers.

Related issues
items.title: Add Screen Capture API options and constraints

items.content_html: This PR removes all of the features that are marked obsolete by #17743 for the API folder. All of the features were confirmed to be considered irrelevant or unsupported as validated by the mdn-bcd-collector project.
items.title: Remove obsolete API features

items.content_html:
Summary

I added Permissions-Policy data in #18250, but I accidentally removed display-capture, and I need it. This PR puts it back.

Test results and supporting details

Related issues
items.title: put back display-capture directive support

items.content_html:
Summary

Add data for HTTP Header Sec-CH-Save-Data.

Test results and supporting details

Chrome Platform Status: https://chromestatus.com/feature/5645928215085056
Chrome bug: https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1293443

Related issues

Content PR: mdn/content#22266
items.title: Add data about Sec-CH-Save-Data

items.content_html:
Summary

Recent versions of Firefox and Safari ignore "unsafe" referer-policies like "unsafe-url".

Test results and supporting details

  • Firefox bug about the removal: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1720294
  • Experimentally, it seems that Safari is ignoring them since version 13
  • Here's a test page: https://home.in.tum.de/~wernerbe/firefox-referrer-bug.html?a=b
    • When the corresponding header is supported, the first two iframes should include the full referrer (including path and query params) in the output, and clicking the link should show the origin instead of None
items.title: Firefox and Safari now ignore "unsafe" referrer-policies
